Articles.Content:
Not sure if its a Fan work but I see it kinda like it since it involves an edited instruction movie.

Anyways, the story is:

I love making space planes, almost more than flying out with rockets. Cant wait til there might be cloud layers added in the game as well.

Howevr, I use two diffrent kinds of tests to benchmark how well my plane designs perform, so it hit me, I could make the shorter test into a challenge to see what other high performing designs other kerbal players might be able to come up with. So here it is.

If you want to partisipate in the challenge it might be best to reply on youtube. But if you like me dislike googles forcing people onto google+ for commenting there I gladly look for replys here as well.

Edited March 1, 2014 by Zalamander

This sounds fun and fairly doable.

But...

Isn't it in the wrong forum?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/26-Challenges

so there was a place for that. I post it there instead. ty.

edit. done http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71257-Space-Plane-Challenge?p=998129#post998129
